title: How Mash.com ignites online monetization with the Bitcoin Lightning Network
description:
CryptoSlate Senior Editor Liam “Akiba” Wright recently sat down with Jared Nusinoff, CEO of Mash.com, for an episode of SlateCast to discuss how the company utilizes Bitcoin’s lightning network to empower publishers. The challenges of content monetization Nusinoff outlined some of the key challenges publishers face when trying to monetize online content. While subscriptions work […]

The post How Mash.com ignites online monetization with the Bitcoin Lightning Network appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Weekly Roundup: Ripple Challenges SEC, Trump Hates CBDCs, & More
description: Former President Donald Trump is in the crypto news again because of his decisive declaration against central bank digital currencies (CBDC). Furthermore, the highly popular Trump NFTs are also making a comeback with Bitcoin Ordinals. Let’s find out more.

title: Colorado regulators sue pastor and wife over crypto scandal
description: Colorado state regulators have filed a civil lawsuit against a Denver pastor, Eli Regalado, and his wife, Kaitlyn, over allegations of a crypto scam involving their creation, INDXcoin.  The lawsuit claims that the couple cashed out over $1.3 million worth of INDXcoin, which they founded, to fund a luxurious lifestyle, including a home remodel, jewelry, […]

title: Dogecoin surges as X payments integration boosts confidence
description: Dogecoin (DOGE) experienced a remarkable 7.36% surge in value over the past 24 hours, coupled with its first Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) golden cross signaling a potentially promising future for the meme-inspired cryptocurrency.  Analysts and traders have attributed this bullish momentum to the recent launch of the X Payments platform, a financial segment of […]

title: 5 things to know in crypto this week – Bitcoin ETFs, the SEC, and tons of disappointment
description: Welcome to another week in the dynamic world of crypto, where developments and disappointments seem to go hand in hand. This week brings a spotlight on five crucial aspects that crypto enthusiasts and investors need to keep a close eye on. From the much-anticipated Bitcoin ETFs to the regulatory moves by the U.S. Securities and […]

title: Netflix SciFi Series director invests $4m in Dogecoin, new P2E gaming meme coin gains traction
description: Director earns $27 million in profit from Dogecoin investment. Meanwhile, Meme Moguls is gaining traction

title: Analyst Predicts 70% Chance of Victory for Coinbase Against the SEC
description:
Bloomberg senior litigation analyst Elliot Stein has predicted that cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase has a high chance of securing a victory in its lawsuit against the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).  In a recent post on X (formerly Twitter), the analyst tweeted that Coinbase has a 70% chance of securing a full dismissal against the […]

The post Analyst Predicts 70% Chance of Victory for Coinbase Against the SEC appeared first on Coin Edition.
